thread.title: Kashima beats Reysol to keep pace with Hiroshima in J-League
thread.title_full: Kashima beats Reysol to keep pace with Hiroshima in J-League

title: Kashima beats Reysol to keep pace with Hiroshima in J-League
text: Kashima beats Reysol to keep pace with Hiroshima in J-League Saturday, 17 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) KASHIMA, Japan (AP) " Mu Kanezaki and Yuma Suzuki scored second-half goals as Kashima Antlers beat Kashiwa Reysol 3-2 Saturday to keep pace with Sanfrecce Hiroshima in the J-League's second-stage standings.Cristiano gave Kashiwa...
